Samuel asserted: "If Chloe is a knight then Evelyn is a knight". Chloe remarked, "Luke is a knight". According to Jacob, "Samuel is a knave and Samuel is a knight". "Chloe is a knave and Chloe is a knight," Liam declared. So who is a knight and who is a knave?
solution_text_format:
(1) Luke is a knave
(2) Lucas is a knave
(3) Evelyn is a knight
(4) Samuel is a knight
(5) Chloe is a knave
(6) Jacob is a knave
(7) Liam is a knave
